----------------------------------------

The “Mini” Magnetic Mixer is a §919x19x21§r Multiblock, used as a direct upgrade to the Industrial Mixing  Machine. 

You’ll need:

§c645§r Radiant Naquadah Alloy Casings
§c791§r Mining Neutronium Casings
§c820§r Mining Black Plutonium Casings
§c60§r Containment Field Casings
§c36§r Volcanus Casings
I/O Ports, a Maintenance Hatch and Energy Hatches
